Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-32911 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-32911 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsoup is earlier than 3.4.4-3, affected by CVE-2025-32911
